Description_lang: Wreathe yourself in arcane energy, preventing the next $s1 full loss of control effects against you. Lasts $d.
AuraDescription_lang: Warded against full loss of control effects.

description_blz.en_US: Wreathe yourself in arcane energy, preventing the next 3 full loss of control effects against you. Lasts 30 sec.
description_blz.es_MX: Te envuelves en energía arcana, lo que impide los próximos 3 efectos de pérdida total de control en tu contra. Dura 30 s.
description_blz.pt_BR: Envolva-se em energia arcana, impedindo os próximos 3 efeitos de perda total de controle contra você. Dura 30 s.
description_blz.de_DE: Hüllt Euch in arkane Energie, die 3 vollständige Kontrollverlusteffekte verhindert. Hält 30 Sek. lang an.
description_blz.en_GB: Wreathe yourself in arcane energy, preventing the next 3 full loss of control effects against you. Lasts 30 sec.
description_blz.es_ES: Te envuelve en energía Arcana, lo que evita los siguientes 3 efectos de pérdida total de control. Dura 30 s.
description_blz.fr_FR: De l’énergie arcanique vous enveloppe et vous protège des 3 prochains effets de perte de contrôle totale dirigés contre vous. Dure 30 s.
description_blz.it_IT: L'energia arcana ti avvolge, annullando i successivi 3 effetti di perdita di controllo del personaggio subiti. Dura 30 s.
description_blz.ru_RU: Вас окружает чародейская энергия, нейтрализующая 3 следующих эффекта потери контроля над персонажем. Время действия – 30 сек.
description_blz.ko_KR: 비전 마력으로 몸을 감싸 다음 3회의 제어 불가 효과를 방지합니다. 30초 동안 지속됩니다.
description_blz.zh_TW: 把你自己圈在秘法能量中，防止下3次對你造成的完全喪失控制效果，持續30秒。
description_blz.zh_CN: 使自己沉浸在奥术能量中，防止下3次使你完全失控的效果，持续30秒。
